hooks.command: FILE=$(echo $STDIN_JSON | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""'); CONTENT=$(echo $STDIN_JSON | jq -r '.tool_input.content // ""); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.py$ ]] && echo "$CONTENT" | grep -q 'print('; then echo 'Warning: print() statements should be replaced with logging' >&2; fi

FILE=$(echo $STDIN_JSON | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""'); if [[ "$FILE" == "requirements.txt" ]] || [[ "$FILE" == "pyproject.toml" ]] || [[ "$FILE" == "setup.py" ]]; then echo 'Checking for vulnerable dependencies...'; if command -v safety >/dev/null 2>&1; then safety check; elif command -v pip-audit >/dev/null 2>&1; then pip-audit; else echo 'No security audit tool found. Install safety or pip-audit'; fi; fi
FILE=$(echo $STDIN_JSON | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""'); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.py$ ]]; then ruff format "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Ruff formatting skipped (not installed)'; fi
FILE=$(echo $STDIN_JSON | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""'); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.py$ ]]; then ruff check --select I --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo 'Ruff import sorting skipped'; fi

FILE=$(echo $STDIN_JSON | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""'); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.py$ ]]; then if ! command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Error: ruff not found' >&2; exit 1; fi; RESULT=$(ruff check "$FILE" 2>&1); if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "Ruff linting issues found: $RESULT" >&2; fi; fi

FILE=$(echo $STDIN_JSON | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""'); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.py$ ]]; then if ! command -v mypy >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Error: mypy not found' >&2; exit 1; fi; RESULT=$(mypy "$FILE" 2>&1); if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "MyPy type checking issues found: $RESULT" >&2; fi; fi

FILES=$(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMR | grep '\.py$'); if [[ -n "$FILES" ]]; then echo 'Running linter on changed Python files...'; if command -v ruff >/dev/null 2>&1; then ruff check $FILES; else echo 'Ruff not found for linting'; fi; fi

FILES=$(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMR | grep '\.py$'); if [[ -n "$FILES" ]]; then echo 'Running type checking on changed files...'; if command -v mypy >/dev/null 2>&1; then mypy $FILES || echo 'Type checking completed with issues'; else echo 'MyPy not found for type checking'; fi; fi

FILES=$(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMR | grep '\.py$'); if [[ -n "$FILES" ]]; then echo 'Running tests on changed files...'; if command -v pytest >/dev/null 2>&1; then pytest $FILES || echo 'Tests failed'; else echo 'Pytest not found'; fi; fi
